name: market for sawnwood, hardwood, raw | sawnwood, hardwood, raw | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/12872/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This represents the global market for sawnwood, raw. It is considered that this product is an intermediate one, and is directly consumed within the planing facility.

With the production of the sawnwood, raw in the planning facility.

With the product taken care within the same facility (drying).
category: C:Manufacturing/16:Manufacture of wood and of products of wood and cork, except furniture; manufacture of articles of straw and plaiting materials/161:Sawmilling and planing of wood/1610:Sawmilling and planing of wood
